SQL.LOAD: SELECT stage_end_id, stage_id, end_status_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by FROM elp_stage_end WHERE stage_end_id = :stage_end_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT se.stage_end_id, se.stage_id, se.end_status_id, GetDescriptionFromListItem(csg.list_item_id, :language_id) AS END_STATUS_DESC, se.created_date, se.created_by, se.modified_date, se.modified_by FROM elp_stage_end se, elp_claim_status_by_group csg WHERE se.end_status_id = csg.claim_status_by_group_id AND se.stage_id = :stage_id
SQL.SEARCH_CLAIM_STAGE_SELECTED: SELECT EIQL.issue_question_id ID, EI.description || ' - ' || ESQ.description DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION_LIST EIQL INNER JOIN ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION EIQ ON EIQL.issue_question_id = EIQ.issue_question_id INNER JOIN ELP_ISSUE EI ON EIQ.issue_id = EI.issue_id INNER JOIN ELP_SOFT_QUESTION ESQ ON EIQ.soft_question_id = ESQ.soft_question_id WHERE EIQL.question_list_id = :question_list_id AND (SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL) BETWEEN EIQL.EFFECTIVE AND EIQL.EXPIRATION ORDER BY EIQL.display_order
SQL.IS_CHILD: SELECT issue_question_list_id FROM elita.elp_issue_question_list WHERE issue_question_id = :issue_question_id AND question_list_id = :question_list_id
